titles.title: Alas, and Did My Savior Bleed?

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Alas, and did my Savior bleed? And did my Sov'reign die? Would He devote that sacred head for such a worm as I?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Was it for crimes that I have done He groaned upon the tree? Amazing pity, grace unknown, and love beyond degree!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Thus might the sun in darkness hide and shut his glories in, when Christ, the mighty Maker died for man the creature's sin.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thus might I hide my blushing face while His dear cross appears, dissolve my heart in thankfulness, and melt mine eyes to tears.

verse.name: v5
